content: in a tizzy is a fun and unique new way to use yarn cakes you ll be making four triangle and joining them as you go to make a square trust me you ll love it this project was initially held as a cal in may 2022 it remains completely free on my blog and on youtube or you can get the premium paid pdf here and on etsy please read the introductory blog post about the cal here 1 also available on etsy 2 <hr> **most important seriously read this part ** **this listing is for the premium pdf version of the pattern you can get the text only version totally free on my blog or from the video tutorials on youtube - it s the same exact pattern but if you buy the pdf you get a beautifully designed printable ad free pattern to add to your pattern binder all while supporting a small business ** the pattern will be be released in 4 parts when you purchase this premium pdf version you ll receive an email from ravelry each time the pattern is updated again see my introductory blog post for more details ***details*** **crochet terminology ** blog & youtube in us pdf in us & uk **skill level ** intermediate but plenty of resources are available to make this easy enough for a new crocheter **stitches used ** chain slip_stitch single_crochet standing single_crochet double_crochet front and back post extended double_crochet treble join-as-you-go method **sizes ** any size square **hook size ** 5mm or whatever is appropriate for your chosen yarn **gauge ** not important for this pattern **additional materials ** yarn needle and scissors for weaving ends blocking supplies ***yarn *** sample uses lion brand mandala ombre but nearly any yarn can be used <hr> visit me polly plum get help or support and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 3 everytrickonthehook for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 4 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 5 visiting polly s place on ravelry 6 or get lots of help and support from the facebook group polly plum pattern posse 7 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 8 1 http //everytrickonthehook com/2022/05/02/in-a-tizzy-cal-intro/ 2 https //www etsy com/pollyplumfiberarts/listing/1212178624/ 3 everytrickonthehook com 4 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 5 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 6 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 7 https //www facebook com/groups/pollyplumcrochetpatterns/ 8 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
